title: MP3 Repair Tool
description:
MP3 Repair Tool V1.5    

Website - http://www.portablefreeware.com/launch.php?id=359 
Screenshot - http://www.portablefreeware.com/graphics/mp3repairtool/screenshot.gif
Download - 

Category: Audio - MP3 Editors (3)

Synopsis: Most corrupted MP3 files consists of broken header information where the audio data is still intact. MP3 Repair Tool helps you clean up broken headers so that the MP3 file can be played again. You can select multiple files to be fixed in batch.

Writes settings to: None


How to extract: Download the installer and install to the default folder C:Program FilesAspect oneMP3 Repair Tool. Then copy all files (except unins000.exe and unins000.dat) to a folder of your choice. Finally, uninstall the program. Launch the program by double-clicking on MP3RepairTool.exe.

Unicode support: No

License: Freeware

System Requirements: Win95 / Win98 / WinME / WinNT / Win2K / WinXP
